text: Jessica Erin Jackley (born October 29, 1977) is an American businesswoman. She is known for having co-founded Kiva and later ProFounder, two organizations that help the creation of businesses through microloans. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Jessica Jackley (TED Community member profile) * "Poverty, money â€” and love" (TEDGlobal 2010) * Clay Water Brick: Finding Inspiration from Entrepreneurs Who Do the Most with the Least Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Pennsylvania
title: Jessica Jackley
